name: Kinetic Sculpture
description: Students will produce time-based three-dimensional artworks. Students will be encouraged to use altered machines, simple electronic components and a wide range of materials.
prerequisites: [VPHA46H3 and VPSB59H3 and VPSB86H3] and [an additional 1.0 credit at the B- or C-level in VPS courses]; students enrolled in the Specialist and Major programs in Studio Art must also complete ACMB01H3
